item.title: 3.3.0-beta
item.description:
This is a beta version which probably has not been sufficiently tested.
  • Version 3.3.0 (Build 454):
    • Columns of the Spectrum and Line Viewer tables can be rearranged by the user (only supported in MacOS 14 Sonoma).
    • Implemented a work around to prevent crashes when starting an import on Intel Macs. Please note that I couldn't test this on an Intel Mac so far.
